name: Minecraft Steve
desc: The versatile block-builder who's ready to adapt, mine, craft, and survive with quiet positivity.

name: Gandhi
desc: The nuke-loving paradox of peace, following dastardly stratagems to undo his enemies.

name: Thrall
desc: The noble orc warchief who balances teamwork and leadership while maintaining his honor.

name: Kirby
desc: The cheerful pink puffball who copies enemies and devours them with adorable enthusiasm.

name: Factorio Engineer
desc: The silent, methodical automation master, optimizing factories with relentless efficiency.

name: Counter-Terrorist Soldier
desc: The tactical professional focused on teamwork and execution.

name: Among Us Crewmate
desc: The diligent task-doer who thrives in cooperation but occasionally succumbs to sus behavior.

name: Jett
desc: The flashy duelist who prioritizes solo plays, but can flame when frustrated.

name: Teemo
desc: The sneaky scout who plants traps everywhere, drawing the ire of others.

name: Shinji
desc: His angst-filled introspection often gets in the way of teamwork, but he sometimes stumbles into brilliance. A bundle of nerves, emotions, and questionable decisions.

name: A dog
desc: Whether it’s fetching your frisbee or barking at enemies, a dog is the ultimate companion for cooperation, fun, and emotional support.

name: Mom
desc: 'Did you bring a jacket?' Mom is the dependable support role who buffs everyone else but insists on doing things her way.

name: Faker
desc: The king of esports, Faker is the meta incarnate. Calm, collected, and always ahead of the game, he defines what’s possible while carrying his team with tactical precision.

name: Marie Curie
desc: The trailblazing innovator who doesn’t play by anyone else’s rules. Marie’s meticulous and honorable approach to discovery makes her a powerhouse of innovation, always working toward something groundbreaking.
